text: Loïc Wacquant (born 1960) is a French Sociologist.Corps et âme – Notes ethnographiques d’un apprenti-boxeur He is specialized in urban sociology, urban poverty, racial inequality and ethnography.Loïc Wacquant, la sociologie lui va comme un gant He graduated from HEC Paris, Paris-Nanterre University, University of Paris and University of Chicago.Loic WACQUANT EN SIX DATES == References == Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:People from Montpellier
title: Loïc Wacquant
